com.uber.autodispose

Interface AutoDispose.ScopeHandler

  • Enclosing class:
    AutoDispose

    public static interface AutoDispose.ScopeHandler
    The intermediary return type of the with(...) factories in AutoDispose. See the documentation on AutoDispose for more information on why this interface exists.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      io.reactivex.functions.Function<io.reactivex.Completable,CompletableSubscribeProxy> forCompletable()
      Entry point for auto-disposing Completables.

      Entry point for auto-disposing Flowables.

      Entry point for auto-disposing Maybes.

      Entry point for auto-disposing Observables.

    • Method Detail

      • forFlowable

        @CheckReturnValue
<T> io.reactivex.functions.Function<io.reactivex.Flowable<? extends T>,FlowableSubscribeProxy<T>> forFlowable()
        Entry point for auto-disposing Flowables.

        Example usage: 

        
   Flowable.just(1)
        .to(AutoDispose.with(scope).forFlowable())
        .subscribe(...)
        Type Parameters:
        T - the stream type.
        Returns:
        a Function to transform with Flowable.to(Function)
